title: Change the date of your practical test

details.description: Change your practical driving or riding test to an earlier or later date, or change the test centre you take it at
details.more_information:
You'll need 2 of the following: 

- Great Britain or Northern Ireland driving licence number
- application reference number
- theory test pass certificate number

Check your driving instructor is available on the new time and date.

You can [find your theory test pass certificate number](/find-lost-theory-test-pass-certificate-number "Find your lost theory test pass certificate number") online if you have lost your original letter.

% You must give at least 3 clear working days' notice to change your test date or you'll have to pay again. Sundays and public holidays don't count as working days. %

^ You can change your appointment 3 times - after that you'll have to cancel your test and book a new one. ^

##Data protection

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for the Driving Standards Agency (DSA)](/dsa-driving-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for DSA") before you start.
details.introduction: Change your practical driving or riding test to an earlier or later date, or change the test centre you take it at. You can do it online between 6am and 11:40pm.
details.alternate_methods:
##Change by phone
You can change your test by calling DSA. 

$C

**DSA practical test bookings and enquiries**  

**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 200 1133 (Welsh)  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1166  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm

$C

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency

tags.title: Driving tests and learning to drive

details.description: Includes booking a test, changing and cancelling tests, rules and fees

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
Cancel your practical driving test if you no longer need your appointment - give 3 working days' notice to get a refund
